languages.text: "Ты же понимаешь, что речь о почти сервиторе, об инструменте?"
"You do realise that we are talking about a half-servitor, a tool?"
languages.original_text: "Ты же понимаешь, что речь о почти сервиторе, об инструменте?"

traits.locale_text: "You do realise that we are talking about a half-servitor, a tool?"
"You do realise that we are talking about a half-servitor, a tool?"
"You do realise that we are talking about a half-servitor, a tool?"
"You do realise that we are talking about a half-servitor, a tool?"
"You do realise that we are talking about a half-servitor, a tool?"
"You do realise that we are talking about a half-servitor, a tool?"

languages.text: 「君も分かっているだろうが、今話しているのは半サーヴィター、ただの道具のことだぞ？」
languages.original_text: "You do realise that we are talking about a half-servitor, a tool?"

traits.locale_text: 「君も分かっているだろうが、今話しているのは半サーヴィター、ただの道具のことだぞ？」

languages.text: "Euch ist aber schon klar, dass wir über etwas reden, das halb Servitor und halb Werkzeug ist?"
languages.original_text: "You do realise that we are talking about a half-servitor, a tool?"

traits.locale_text: "Euch ist aber schon klar, dass wir über etwas reden, das halb Servitor und halb Werkzeug ist?"

languages.text: « Vous avez conscience que nous sommes en train de parler d'un demi-servitor, d'un outil ? »
languages.original_text: "You do realise that we are talking about a half-servitor, a tool?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez conscience que nous sommes en train de parler d'un demi-servitor, d'un outil ? »

languages.text: «¿Se da cuenta de que estamos hablando de un animal mitad servidor? Es prácticamente una herramienta».
languages.original_text: "You do realise that we are talking about a half-servitor, a tool?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Se da cuenta de que estamos hablando de un animal mitad servidor? Es prácticamente una herramienta».

languages.text: “你应该明白吧？生化獒犬和机仆没什么区别，仅仅是工具而已。”
languages.original_text: "You do realise that we are talking about a half-servitor, a tool?"

traits.locale_text: “你应该明白吧？生化獒犬和机仆没什么区别，仅仅是工具而已。”

languages.text: "Bir yarı hizmetörden, araçtan bahsettiğimizin farkında mısın?"
languages.original_text: "You do realise that we are talking about a half-servitor, a tool?"

traits.locale_text: "Bir yarı hizmetörden, bir araçtan bahsettiğimizin farkındasın, değil mi?"
